# Compiled object files
*.o
*.obj

# Logs and database files
*.log
*.ldf
*.mdf

# Visual Studio specific files
.vs/
.vscode/
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates
.vsconfig

# Build results
bin/
obj/

# Configuration
appsettings*.json
launchSettings.json

# JetBrains Rider specific files
.idea/
.idea_modules/

# Mac build results
build/
DerivedData/
*.pbxuser
!default.pbxuser
*.mode1v3
*.mode2v3
*.perspectivev3
xcuserdata/
*.xccheckout
*.xcuserstate

# MAUI specific
.platforms/
*.apk
*.aab
*.ipa
*.app
*.dll
*.dSYM
*.nupkg

# Mono Auto Generated Files
mono_crash.*

# NuGet Packages
*.nupkg
packages/
.nuget/

# Node.js files (in case of using Node for some tools)
node_modules/
npm-debug.log*

# IDE Specific
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Sensitive data
secrets.json
secrets/*.json
